title: La Peste
overview: We are in 2030, in a society where today's fears and concerns strangely resonate.This company is just coming out of the wave of covid epidemics. And the plague she encounters is much more formidable...While we have learned to live with the seasonal variants of covid, we discover in this southern city a new variant of the plague bacillus called YP2.For lack of treatment, the central government will decide, in order to spare the rest of the country, to close the city - and then apply a mysterious "Plan D" of which we will gradually discover the monstrous springs.Based on the work of Albert Camus.
